description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if TrainwrecksTV opens a Case Hardened AK-47 with Pattern Template #661 in any exterior condition (Factory New, Minimal Wear, Field-Tested, Well-Worn, or Battle-Scarred) during a live stream by January 29, 2026, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, "Case Hardened AK-47 #661" refers to a Counter-Strike 2 AK-47 | Case Hardened skin with Pattern Template Index 661, commonly known as the "Blue Gem" pattern. The pattern index must be verifiable on-screen during the live stream as #661.

For the purpose of this market, "Stream" refers to a live video broadcast hosted by TrainwrecksTV. Prerecorded videos, videos not intended for public release, or other non-live content will not count.

For the purpose of this market, "opens" means TrainwrecksTV must personally unbox/open the item from a case and reveal the item during the live stream. Secondary market purchases, trades, or items opened off-stream will not count.

The primary resolution source for this market will be TrainwrecksTV's Kick channel (https://kick.com/trainwreckstv) and/or Twitch channel (https://www.twitch.tv/trainwreckstv); however, a consensus of credible reporting with video evidence may also be used. If evidence from multiple platforms conflicts, resolution will be based on the clearest complete video record.

markets.question: Will Trainwreckstv unbox a AK-47 Case Hardened #661?

title: Will Trainwreckstv unbox a AK-47 Case Hardened #661?
